data.name: Baked eggs and Asparagus
data.summary: INGREDIENTS: A handful of fresh asparagus, 1-2 tbsp of butter, 2 eggs, 1 tsp fresh ground pepper, 1 clove of garlic, 1 tsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp olive oil. INSTRUCTIONS: (1) Trim asparagus and mince the garlic (2)  On you cutting board, mix together garlic, oil, soy sauce and pepper and roll the asparagus through the oil mixture until coated. (4) Layer asparagus across a baking dish and crack two eggs over the top (5) Mix butter with the remaining oil and garlic mix and dab on top of eggs (6) Airfry at 385F for about 10 min --or until eggs and asparagus are cooked as desired.

steps.instruction: Trim the asparagus and mince the garlic
On you cutting board, mix together garlic, oil, soy sauce and pepper and roll the asparagus through the oil mixture until coated.
Layer asparagus across a baking dish and crack two eggs over the top of the asparagus then mix butter with the remaining oil and garlic mix and dab on top of eggs
Airfry at 385F for about 10 min --or until eggs and asparagus are cooked as desired.

data.notes: Great Light Meal For Anytime of Day

data.name: Air Fried Okra
data.summary: INGREDIENTS: 1/4 lb fresh okra - chopped, 1/4 cup flour, 2 tbsp cornmeal, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, 1/4 tsp fresh ground pepper, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 cup Greek Yogurt mixed with 2 tbsp water, oil for frying. INSTRUCTIONS: (1) In a shallow bowl, whisk together: flour, cornmeal, garlic powder, pepper and salt. In a separate bowl whisk greek yogurt and water. (2) Fully coat the okra with the yogurt mixture. Then, one at a time or in small batches dredge in the flour mixture and set in baking pan. (3) Drizzle or spray olive oil over okra and shake to coat all sides. Airfry at 385 for 15 minutes --pause halfway to shake. (4) Enjoy with a dipping sauce (such as greek yogurt ranch)
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek Yogurt mixed with 2 tbsp water

steps.instruction: In a shallow bowl, whisk together: flour, cornmeal, garlic powder, pepper and salt. In a separate bowl whisk greek yogurt and water.
Fully coat the okra with the yogurt mixture. Then, one at a time or in small batches dredge in the flour mixture and set in baking pan.
Drizzle or spray olive oil over okra and shake to coat all sides. Airfry at 385 for 15 minutes --pause halfway to shake.
Enjoy with a dipping sauce (such as greek yogurt ranch)

data.name: pickled onions
data.summary: INGREDIENTS: 1 onion, 3/4 cup beet juice, 3/4 cup white vinegar, 1 tsp dry mustard seed, 1/2 tbsp salt, 3/8 cup white sugar, 1 spring fresh rosemary. INSTRUCTIONS: (1) Slice the onion into thin rings or rainbows (I used a medium yellow onion, but I based this on ingredients from a jar of pickled purple onions so I suspect any bulbous onion is fine). (2) put the onion slices and all other ingredients into a sterile mason jar. (3) seal the jar and shake until all sugar and salt are dissolved (4) leave in fridge for at least three days to marinate

steps.instruction: Slice the onion into thin rings or rainbows (I used a medium yellow onion, but I based this on ingredients from a jar of pickled purple onions so I suspect any bulbous onion is fine)
put the onion slices and all other ingredients into a sterile mason jar
seal the jar and shake until all sugar and salt are dissolved
leave in fridge for at least three days to marinate

data.notes: great on sandwiches, salads or rice

data.name: creamy avocado, pickled onion wontons
data.summary: INGREDIENTS: pinch of pickled onions, 1 wonton wrapper, 3-5 chunks of fresh avocado, a bit of chopped walnut (optional),1 healthy glob of cream cheese, oil (to coat wonton wrapper). INSTRUCTIONS: (1) coat the outside of wonton wrapper with oil then put all ingredients on un-oiled side (2) fold wonton wrapper around filling and put into a muffin tray, silicon muffin cup or directly onto the rack of an air frier (3) set temp to 385 and air fry for 4-6 minutes or until outside is browned

steps.instruction: coat the outside of wonton wrapper with oil then put all ingredients on un-oiled side
fold wonton wrapper around filling and put into a muffin tray, silicon muffin cup or directly onto the rack of an air frier
set temp to 385 and air fry for 4-6 minutes or until outside is browned
let cool and enjoy

data.notes: Pairs nicely with your favorite dipping sauces

data.name: Sourdough Starter
data.summary: INGREDIENTS:  flour, filtered water. INSTRUCTIONS: [Day 1] (1) In a sterile glass jar combine 1/2 cup flour and 1/2 cup filtered water (2) Stir until combined, forming a thick paste. (3) Cover jar loosely with lid or cheese cloth and set in a warm (approx 75F), draft free location. [Days 2-5] (1) Discard half the mixture (2) stir in 1/2 cup flour and 1/2 cup water (3) Cover and set in a warm, draft free location. [DAYS 6-7] Increase the frequency to every 12 hours. Discard half the mixture and feed as before. [STORING AND MAINTAINING] The starter is ready when it doubles in size within 4-8 hours after feeding, has a bubbly appearance and smells fermented. Once this is achieved, you may store it in the fridge (loosely covered) and cut back feeding to once every 7-10 days. [ACTIVATE BEFORE USE] Your starter should be brought upto room temperature and have a bubbly appearance before using in baking.

steps.instruction: [Day 1] (1) In a sterile glass jar combine 1/2 cup flour and 1/2 cup filtered water (2) Stir until combined, forming a thick paste. (3) Cover jar loosely with lid or cheese cloth and set in a warm (approx 75F), draft free location.
[Days 2-5] (1) Discard half the mixture (2) stir in 1/2 cup flour and 1/2 cup water (3) Cover and set in a warm, draft free location.
[DAYS 6-7] Increase the frequency to every 12 hours. Discard half the mixture and feed as before.

[STORING AND MAINTAINING] The starter is ready when it doubles in size within 4-8 hours after feeding, has a bubbly appearance and smells fermented. Once this is achieved, you may store it in the fridge (loosely covered) and cut back feeding to once every 7-10 days.
[ACTIVATE BEFORE USE] Your starter should be brought upto room temperature and have a bubbly appearance before using in baking.

data.name: San Francisco Style Sourdough Bread
data.summary: INGREDIENTS: 15g Active Dry Yeast, 8fl oz water (at temp 110F), 6oz Sourdough Starter, 1lb Bread Flour, 15g salt, cornmeal --as needed, egg white -beaten. INSTRUCTIONS: (1) Sprinkle yeast over 2fl oz water and set aside until dissolved and foamy. (2) Add the remaining flour and salt. Knead until the dough is smooth and elastic, approx 10 minutes. (3)

steps.instruction: Sprinkle yeast over 2fl oz water and set aside until dissolved and foamy.
In the bowl of a stand mixer, fitted with a dough hook, combine the starter and the remaining 6oz of flour.
Stir until a dough forms, then add yeast mixture. Knead 5 minutes on medium speed.
Add the remaining 10 oz flour and the 15g salt. Knead (with stand mixer) until the dough is smooth and elastic, approx 10 minutes.
Place the dough in a lightly greased bowl and cover with a damp cloth. Ferment --until doubled-- in a warm place (about 80-90F)
Punch down the dough and shape it into a round loaf. Place the loaf on a greased and cornmeal dusted sheet-pan.
Proof the dough in a warm place, covered with a damp cloth, until it has risen to 2 1/2 times its original size.
Brush the risen loaf with the beaten egg white and score the top of the loaf with a sharp knife.
Bake at 450F, spraying steam in for the first 4 minutes of baking.
Reduce to 375F and continue baking until the loaf is well browned, approximately 35-45 minutes.

data.notes: Great for sandwiches, bruschetta or garlic toast

data.name: Caprese Bruscetta
data.summary: INGREDIENTS: 8-10 slices of french italian or sourdough bread, 16-20 grape tomatoes, a handful of fresh basil leaves, 2 tsp balsamic vinegar, 1 tsp fresh ground pepper, 1 tsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp olive oil, 2 oz fresh mozzarella cheese. INSTRUCTIONS: (1) Slice the tomatoes into small discs and slice the basil into thin ribbons (2)In a small bowl combine tomatoes, basil, balsamic, ground pepper and soy sauce. Set aside to marinate. (3) dribble olive oil over sliced bread and toast for 2-4 minutes (to desired crispness) (4) Thinly Slice mozzarella (5)Top the toasted bread with tomato mixture and mozzarella.
ingredients: 8-10 slices of french italian or sourdough bread
a handful of fresh basil leaves

steps.instruction: Slice the tomatoes into small discs and slice the basil into thin ribbons
In a small bowl combine tomatoes, basil, balsamic, ground pepper and soy sauce. Set aside to marinate.
Dribble olive oil over sliced bread and toast for 2-4 minutes (to desired crispness)
Thinly Slice mozzarella.
Top the toasted bread with tomato mixture and mozzarella
Slice the tomatoes into small discs and slice the basil into thin ribbons
